titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-(4-chloro-2-methyl phenoxy) propionic acid.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1478)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on 2-(4-chloro-2- methyl phenoxy) propionic acid.
